O'al Kan's Sceptre

(Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Extra effect on hit: Small Area Fatigue

weap id [weapon]: 411 (Small Area Fatigue)
damage [dmg]: 10 Fatigue
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
area of effect [aoe]: 1
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 10F to forge (F2)

This sceptre was created long ago for a powerful Abysian warlord. The sceptre makes it possible to command more men and hurl huge balls of flame at the enemy. It grants partial protection from cold and, if used in melee, will inflict fatigue on anyone close to where it strikes.
